translations.home.hero.description: We are a family-run breeder specializing in French Bulldogs of quality. Our puppies are raised with love and attention to become your loyal companions.
translations.home.hero.additionalInfo: Each puppy is from parents selected for their health, temperament, and conformity to the breed standards. We do everything we can to offer you healthy and well-socialized puppies.
translations.home.puppies.title: Our latest puppies
translations.home.whyUs.title: Why choose us?
translations.home.whyUs.qualityDescription: Our puppies are from parents selected for their health and conformity to the breed standards.
translations.home.whyUs.followUpDescription: All our puppies are vaccinated and identified.
translations.home.whyUs.familyDescription: Our puppies are raised in a family environment, which promotes their socialization and balance.
translations.home.testimonials.title: What our clients say
translations.home.contact.title: Contact us
translations.home.contact.description: Have any questions about our puppies or want to schedule a visit? Feel free to contact us, we'll be happy to answer your questions.

translations.home.puppies.2.name: Puppy 2
translations.home.puppies.3.name: Puppy 3
translations.home.testimonials.1.name: Client 1
translations.home.testimonials.1.description: Our French Bulldog is wonderful! We are happy to have adopted it from Frenchie Pour Toi. Thank you for your professionalism and kindness.

translations.home.testimonials.2.description: Our French Bulldog is wonderful! We are happy to have adopted it from Frenchie Pour Toi. Thank you for your professionalism and kindness.
translations.home.testimonials.3.name: Client 3
translations.home.testimonials.3.description: Our French Bulldog is wonderful! We are happy to have adopted it from Frenchie Pour Toi. Thank you for your professionalism and kindness.
translations.footer.description: Quality French Bulldog breeder. Our puppies are raised with love and attention to become your loyal companions.

translations.scroll-to-top-button.title: Scroll to top
translations.puppies.title: Our puppies
translations.puppies.header.title: Our adorable French Bulldogs
translations.puppies.header.description: Discover our adorable French Bulldogs available for reservation. All our puppies are raised with love and attention in a family environment.
translations.puppies.header.description2: Each puppy is from parents selected for their health, temperament, and conformity to the breed standards. We do everything we can to offer you healthy and well-socialized puppies.
translations.puppies.header.description3: Our puppies are available from 8 weeks, the legal minimum age for the sale of a puppy. They are sold with a health certificate, a health record, an electronic chip, and a written guarantee.
translations.puppies.empty.title: No puppy found
translations.puppies.empty.filtered: Try to modify your search criteria
translations.puppies.error.title: Loading error
translations.puppy.filters.title: Filter puppies
translations.puppies.nextLitters.title: Litter expected in {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.puppies.nextLitters.description: A litter is expected in {$INTERPOLATION} between our female {$INTERPOLATION_1} and our male {$INTERPOLATION_2}. The puppies will be available from {$INTERPOLATION_3}.
translations.puppies.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
translations.puppies.contact.title: Ready to welcome a French Bulldog?
translations.puppies.contact.description: Contact us today to learn more about our available puppies or to schedule a visit to our breeding. We will be happy to welcome you and introduce you to our French Bulldogs.
translations.puppies.faq.reserve.question: How to reserve a puppy?
translations.puppies.faq.reserve.answer: You can contact us by phone, email or through our contact form. A deposit of 30% of the puppy's price is required to confirm the reservation. The balance is to be paid upon delivery of the puppy.
translations.puppies.faq.age.question: At what age are the puppies available?
translations.puppies.faq.age.answer: Our puppies are available from 8 weeks, the legal minimum age for the sale of a puppy. This allows them to stay with their mother and siblings for a good socialization.
translations.puppies.faq.documents.question: What documents are provided with the puppy?
translations.puppies.faq.documents.answer: Each puppy is sold with a health certificate issued by our veterinarian, a health record of vaccinations, an electronic chip, a LOF birth certificate (if applicable), a sales contract, and a written guarantee.
